original_text: And when she came to her mother-in-law, she said, “How did you fare, my daughter?” Then she told her all that the man had done for her,
korean_text: 룻이 시어머니에게 가니 그가 이르되 내 딸아 어떻게 되었느냐 하니 룻이 그 사람이 자기에게 행한 것을 다 알리고

sentences.original_text: And when she came to her mother-in-law,
all that the man had done for her,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자가 그녀를 위해 해준 모든 것을
